name: The SquadMC Network - Minecraft Multi Mini-Games Server
blurb: Our Server, If Funded, Will be one of the best servers on Minecraft! We aim to provide you with unique Mini-Games!

rewards.reward:
VIP 12 Month Rank
--------------------------
Your rank will allow you to some great features on our upcoming server!

You will get:

- Access to the Development Forums
- Get a VIP tag next to your Name
- Ability to Join Full Games
- BETA Mini-Games before the general Public
- Great HUB Perks
- Ability to use HUB Gadgets
- Ability to Apply for Staff
- Extra Kits in Selected Mini-Games
- A Pet on the HUB
- Access to our VIP HUB
- Earn Coins 2x as Quick
- More Features added on Launch

Duration: 12 Months

VIP+ 12 Month Rank
--------------------------
Your rank will allow you to some great features on our upcoming server!

You will get:

- Extra Kits in Selected Mini-Games
- A Pet on the HUB
- Access to our VIP HUB
- Ability to Fly in the HUB
- Even Better Kits than VIP
- Earn Coins 3x as Quick
- More Features added on Launch

Duration: 12 Months

ULTRA Lifetime Rank 
-------------------------------
This Rank is a Kickstarter ONLY Rank. This means YOU will be the only one to be able to get this Rank and it will not be available after the Kickstarter has Finished!

You Will Get:

- All VIP Features
- All VIP+ Features
- ULTRA Tag Next to your Name
- ULTRA Only KIts
- Earn Coins 4x as Quick
- More Features added on Launch

Manager Of The Server
--------------------------------
Help us, Work with us, and decide on what we should add next to the server. You will become one of the head leaders of the server and you will make crucial descisions on where the server should go next. 

Included:

VIP
VIP+
ULRTA
STAFF
ADMIN
MANAGER
